item.title: Variance Stabilizing Transformations
item.description: I want to record here a very interesting thing which I recently discovered, variance-stabilizing transformations. The idea is very simple: suppose we have a random variable \(x\), which follows a probability distribution which is parametrized solely by its mean \(\mu\), with variance \(var(x) = g(\mu)\) a known function of the mean.
